== v0.3.5 ==
  * Better suggestions for file renaming
  * Empty meta data reader for unsupported file formats. Any file format can be added with the preferences dialog.
  * Automatic save sets the selection to the clicked entry in the ebook list now.
  * Added Folders get watched for changes.
  * Sometimes, the underlying database creates duplicates. There is a fix now.
  * Readonly HTML meta data support.
